title: 02/21/22 DPS Best Of - Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre
itunes:title: 02/21/22 DPS Best Of - Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre
description:
On the Monday edition of the Best Of The Dan Patrick Show: Doug and Jason react to the melee between the Michigan and Wisconsin college basketball teams, and what the appropriate discipline will be for Michigan head coach Juwan Howard.

FOX Sports NFL analyst Mark Schlereth joins the guys to talk about Tom Brady v Bruce Arians and what it would take for the Denver Broncos to get Aaron Rodgers. The guys talk about the NBA's All-Star weekend and LeBron James saying that the door is not closed on a return to Cleveland.

Doug and Jason address the stories that FSR colleague Rich Ohrnberger broke through his social media about Pat Mahomes's family and Tom Brady's alleged rift with Bruce Arians and his OC Byron Leftwich in Tampa.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
